title: Green Chords
explanation: To display connections between chromosomes that are the same.

title: Dark Green Insertion Histogram
explanation: To show the distribution of insertion type mutations that have been validated.

title: Purple Chords
explanation: To display connections between chromosomes that are different.

title: Light Orange Heterozygous Histogram
explanation: To show the distribution of heterozygous mutations aggregated by 10Mb.
